RNS Number : 1568LAVEVA Group PLC08 September 2021

BLOCK LISTING SIX MONTHLY RETURN

Date: 8 September 2021

Name of applicant :

AVEVA GROUP PLC

Name of scheme:

AVEVA GROUP PLC LONG TERM INCENTIVE PLAN and AVEVA Senior Employee Restricted Share Plan

Period of return:

From:

8 March 2021

To:

7 September 2021

Balance of unallotted securities under scheme(s) from previous return:

102,950 ordinary shares

Plus: The amount by which the block scheme(s) has been increased since the date of the last return (if any increase has been applied for):

1,300,000 ordinary Shares

Less: Number of securities issued/allotted under scheme(s) during period (see LR3.5.7G):

63,771 ordinary shares

Equals: Balance under scheme(s) not yet issued/allotted at end of period:

1,339,179 ordinary shares

Name of contact:

Claire Denton, EVP Group General Counsel and Company Secretary

Telephone number of contact:

+44 (0)1223 556655
